thread.title: Iran says verdict issued over Washington Post reporter
thread.title_full: Iran says verdict issued over Washington Post reporter | News24

author: news24.com
title: Iran says verdict issued over Washington Post reporter
text:
Iran - A verdict has been issued in the trial in Iran of Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian, the country's judiciary said on Sunday, without disclosing the judgment.
Iranian-American Rezaian, the US newspaper's Tehran correspondent, was arrested in July 2014 and accused of spying, along with other crimes against national security.
He was tried in four hearings behind closed doors, the last of which was held in August.
"The verdict for this case has been issued," Gholamhossein Mohseni Ejeie, the judiciary's spokesman and deputy chief, was Quote: d on Sunday as saying on its official website.
